EXTRACTED VALUE: But in the end the boxing action itself is not as fun as it should be, because it's all about being fastest, and the AI does tend to cheat.
Dynasty Warriors 6 isn't properly bad, it doesn't contain anything appalling. However, average is the suitable word here.
We so wanted to like this game but it kept slapping us in the face with bad controls, repetitive puzzles and the annoying inventory. [Issue#34]
It just seems that not much thought has gone into the level design and gameplay beyond “could a five-year-old play this?”.
The Witch certainly has bags of style, but is let down by brain-dead AI and short gametime.
